name: Dulac Dirty Rice
author: Zatarain's
summary: This dish has it all. It gets color from the bell peppers, crunch from the pecans, sweetness from the raisins and saltiness from the bacon.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package ZATARAIN'S® Dirty Rice Mix, Original
¼ cup chopped red bell pepper
¼ cup chopped yellow bell pepper
½ cup thinly sliced green onions
directions: Cook ground beef in large skillet on medium-high heat until no longer pink
Add water to same skillet; bring to boil
Stir in Rice Mix and ground beef; return to boil
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 25 minutes or until rice is tender
Melt 1 tablespoon of the butter in medium skillet on medium heat
Add pecans; cook and stir 2 minutes or until lightly browned
Melt remaining 1 tablespoon butter in same skillet
Add bell peppers and raisins; cook and stir 3 minutes or until tender
Add to rice mixture; stir until well mixed
Sprinkle with bacon and green onions before serving
